function.plugin.mechanism

Annotation Type ParameterMarker


  • @Retention(value=RUNTIME)
 @Target(value=FIELD)
public @interface ParameterMarker
    An annotation for indicating a field is an input or output parameter. This annotation is a useful way for plugins to declare their inputs and outputs simply.
    Author:
    Johannes Schindelin, Grant Harris, Curtis Rueden

    • Optional Element Summary

      Optional Elements 
      Modifier and Type Optional Element and Description
      java.lang.String[] choices
      Defines the choices for a UI_DROPDOWN
      boolean defaultBoolean
      Defines the default value for a UI_CHECKBOX
      int defaultChoice
      Defines the default choice index for a UI_DROPDOWN
      java.lang.String defaultText
      Defines the default value for a UI_TEXTFIELD, UI_FILECHOOSER, & UI_PASSWORD
      java.lang.String description
      Defines a description for the parameter.
      java.lang.String name
      Defines a label for the parameter.
      boolean optional
      Defines whether the parameter value must be non-null.
      int ui
      Defines a description for the parameter.
      int uiOrder
      Defines a label for the parameter.
